sourceMeaningMnemonic: This <radical>tree</radical> is the <radical>master</radical> of a <kanji>pillar</kanji>. The pillar is subservient to its tree master because the tree is so great and awesome and big and cool and stuff. The pillar has great respect for its tree master.
meaningInfo: See the pillar next to the tree master. See the pillar bow over and over in veneration of its tree master.
readingMnemonic: While bowing, the <kanji>pillar</kanji> accidentally smashes <reading>Chew</reading>bacca (<ja>ちゅう</ja>). The pillar is horrified for having murdered Chewbacca, his tree master’s closest friend. The pillar is going to be punished.
readingInfo: Hear the crack and snap of branches as the tree beats the crap out of the pillar for having murdered Chewbacca. Unforgivable.
